movies.title: Mary Poppins Returns
movies.descrpition: Decades after her original visit, the magical nanny returns to help the Banks siblings and Michael's children through a difficult time in their lives.

movies.title: Love Actually
movies.descrpition: Follows the lives of eight very different couples in dealing with their love lives in various loosely interrelated tales all set during a frantic month before Christmas in London, England.

movies.title: Ready Player One
movies.descrpition: When the creator of a virtual reality world called the OASIS dies, he releases a video in which he challenges all OASIS users to find his Easter Egg, which will give the finder his fortune.

movies.title: Bumblebee
movies.descrpition: On the run in the year of 1987, Bumblebee finds refuge in a junkyard in a small Californian beach town. Charlie, on the cusp of turning 18 and trying to find her place in the world, discovers Bumblebee, battle-scarred and broken

movies.title: White Boy Rick
movies.descrpition: The story of teenager Richard Wershe Jr., who became an undercover informant for the FBI during the 1980s and was ultimately arrested for drug-trafficking and sentenced to life in prison.

movies.title: Avengers
movies.descrpition: In the aftermath of Thanos wiping out half of all life in the universe, the remaining Avengers must do whats necessary to undo the Mad Titans deed.

movies.title: Casino Royale
movies.descrpition: Armed with a license to kill, Secret Agent James Bond sets out on his first mission as 007, and must defeat a private banker to terrorists in a high stakes game of poker at Casino Royale, Montenegro, but things are not what they seem.

movies.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
movies.descrpition: Peter Parker balances his life as an ordinary high school student in Queens with his superhero alter-ego Spider-Man, and finds himself on the trail of a new menace prowling the skies of New York City.

movies.title: First Man
movies.descrpition: A look at the life of the astronaut, Neil Armstrong, and the legendary space mission that led him to become the first man to walk on the Moon on July 20, 1969.
